name: Random Evolution Challenge
description: Build your team from randomly selected Digimon that unlock as you progress through the story.

rules.title: Level Cap
rules.description: Max level restricted to upcoming boss level

rules.title: Random Team
rules.description: Team must be built from randomly determined Digimon (no duplicates). You get a new random team after each boss quest completion.

rules.title: Evolution Restriction
rules.description: Only use Digimon up to your current unlocked evolution generation. New generations unlock at specific bosses.
